attributes.action: Call A General Election As The People Of This Country Did Not Vote Gordon Brown Into Power.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When Tony Blair left office an unelected and unchallenged prime minister took office. The people of this Country did not vote for Gordon Brown as Prime Minister, to run this country(as he sees fit!). Due to that fact a general election should and must be called to remedy that fact. If we the people do not demand this, the democratic process will be proven to be a farce! The Definition of Democracy, as well all know, is majority rule. Gorden Brown is not the majority! It's Maybe A "New World Order"!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
